name: automerge-wasm-pack
description: wasm-bindgen bindings to the automerge rust implementation

scripts.build: rimraf ./node && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --dev --out-name index -d node && cp index.d.ts node
scripts.release-w: rimraf ./web && wasm-pack build --target web --release --out-name index -d web && cp index.d.ts web
scripts.release-n: rimraf ./node && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --release --out-name index -d node && cp index.d.ts node
